verses.name: Lamentations 5:8
verses.text: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:9
verses.text: We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:10
verses.text: Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:11
verses.text: They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:12
verses.text: Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:13
verses.text: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.

verses.name: Lamentations 5:14
verses.text: The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.
